agentData.mission: Create a minimal automated validation harness (e.g., a single command/script) that runs the scaffold generator and then verifies expected files exist in /outputs (REPORT_OUTLINE.md, CASE_STUDY_TEMPLATE.md, METADATA_SCHEMA.md, CASE_STUDIES_INDEX.csv, rights artifacts) and outputs a pass/fail report saved under /outputs/qa/.
